subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Astana rider Levi Leipheimer won the second stage of the Vuelta a Castilla y León race Tuesday, beating his teammate Alberto Contador by 16 seconds. Leipheimer won the 17-mile time trial around the town of Palencia, Spain, in 33 minutes 17.78 seconds. Leipheimer, who won the Tour of California this season, leads Contador in the overall standings by 16 seconds.
